sentences.en: All - Around Vision ( Ex ): Beholders are exceptionally alert and circumspect.
sentences.cn: 全域视野 ( 特异 ): 眼魔异常警惕和谨慎.

sentences.en: All the products that I have recommended can be supplied by prompt and circumspect after - sales services .
sentences.cn: 凡经本人推荐的产品均保证提供及时周到的 售后服务.

sentences.en: Because our service team is skillful, we and circumspect service.
sentences.cn: 同时我们拥有一支技术精干 、 服务热情的售后服务队伍,解决您的后顾之忧.

sentences.en: He decided to be more circumspect.
He is circumspect and farseeing and seldom fails.
sentences.cn: 他做事老谋深算,很少失误.

sentences.en: Management principle: Best quality at competitive price and circumspect service Excel in establishing everlasting cooperation.
sentences.cn: 经营原则: “质优价廉、服务至上”.愿与广大客户建立永续的合作关系,共创美好的明天.

sentences.en: Nicholas Lardy at the Peterson Institute in Washington is more circumspect.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿彼得森研究所(PetersonInstitute)的尼古拉斯?拉迪(NicholasLardy)的看法更为谨慎.

sentences.en: Physicians are now more circumspect about recommending its use.
sentences.cn: 现在的医生在推荐使用该药物时更加慎重了.

sentences.en: She is very circumspect when dealing with strangers.
sentences.cn: 她与陌生人打交道时十分谨慎.

sentences.en: Supply warm, circumspect and timely service for every customer.
sentences.cn: 我们热情 、 周到、及时的为每一位客户提供优质服务.

sentences.en: The banks should have been more circumspect in their dealings.
sentences.cn: 那些银行在交易中本该更加谨慎的。

sentences.en: The governor was usually circumspect when dealing with the media.
sentences.cn: 这位州长和媒体打交道时通常都很谨慎小心。

sentences.en: We must not expect a lively young man to be always and circumspect.
sentences.cn: 我们往往会因为我们自己的虚荣心,而给弄迷了心窍.

sentences.en: You are too circumspect, you pay attention to every detail.
sentences.cn: 你总毫末不放, 未免过于精细.

sentences.en: You seem to be implying, in your usual circumspect manner, that perhaps it might not be a wonderful idea.
sentences.cn: 你好像正以你一贯谨言慎行的方式暗示，那个主意也许不怎么样。

sentences.en: Yuefei will continuously provide customers with high - quality products and circumspect services, with customers in mind.
sentences.cn: 越飞愿一如既往,本着“服务用户”的原则,继续为用户提供优质的产品,周到的服务, 热情欢迎新老客户莅临指导.

trans.tran_en: If you are circumspect, you are cautious in what you do and say and do not take risks
